title: Linguaphone Spanish (1973) PDFs+Audio
description:
Linguaphone Spanish (1973) 


Description:

This is Linguaphone's Spanish course from 1973 with coursebook, handbook, and audio files. The layout of the course follows the layout of all the other courses produced in the 1970s by linguaphone: You follow a family who speaks the target language (in this case Spanish) as they travel back to their country of "origin" where the language originates and "experience" their adventures.


Target language: Spanish

Learning language: English



Notes:

1. The coursebook wasn't scanned from the original book: I got it from another source (Russian). It was originally a parallel text, Spanish on the left and Russian on the right, so I just "removed" (cropped) the Russian text.

2. I didn't scan the Spanish-English dictionary at the end of the handbook. 

3. The Writing excercise book isn't included.

4. I split the audio into sections according to the lesson/sub headings.

5. This isn't the same Spanish course being sold today by Linguaphone.
